response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and lead to substantial growth. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it offers, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $1,200,000. This price is exclusive and tailored to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your industry. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely in terms of efficiency gains and competitive advantage. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can specifically benefit your company.", "product_price": 1200000}
